::KitKat::

She closed her eyes and rested.  She groaned at the pain inher chest 
and body.  She tried to think about how to attackthe maximals and get 
back at them for all they had done to her team.  First, they needed a 
base. Then again,  They may only need the cave for cover.  She 
thought about keeping her pack more on the move.  Keep the cave for 
repairs and stashing supplies.  She could keep them a moble unit and 
attacke the maximals randomly and not worry about them attacking 
thier base, for they wouldn't have a technical base.  And allt he 
supplies int he cave could be kept so it could be moved out at a 
moments notice.  She smiled at her idea.  It could work, she thought.

She coughed and groaned at the pain.  She felt her body go numb for a 
bit.  And for a brief moment, she didn't feel any pain as she fell 
into the darkness of sleep.  She entered a deep sleep.
